description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。第十三届全国人民代表大会黑龙江地区代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, and a member of the Chinese Communist Party. She is a delegate for the Heilongjiang region to the 13th National People's Congress.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省
location.en: Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，是丰晓敏的籍贯所在省份。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China, and the province of Feng Xiaomin's ancestral home.

description.zh-cn: 中国的多数民族，丰晓敏是汉族。
description.en: The majority ethnic group in China, to which Feng Xiaomin belongs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.
The country of Feng Xiaomin's nationality.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区，丰晓敏是该地区的全国人大代表。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China, for which Feng Xiaomin served as a delegate to the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会代表

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会代表
en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关的组成人员。
description.en: A member of the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本“辽宁昌图人”，丰晓敏的籍贯地为昌图县。
description.en: According to the text 'a person from Changtu, Liaoning', Feng Xiaomin's ancestral home is Changtu County.
Feng Xiaomin is of Han ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 丰晓敏是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Feng Xiaomin is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，丰晓敏当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会代表，代表黑龙江地区。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Feng Xiaomin was elected as a delegate to the 13th National People's Congress, representing the Heilongjiang region.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会代表

description.zh-cn: 丰晓敏担任全国人大代表。
description.en: Feng Xiaomin serves as a deputy to the National People's Congress.
